title: Hey Riot how does it feel to know your trash game is losing players in mass?
body:
I must say it's about damn time.
1) You're the worst gaming company in history,
2) Your trash pretend usermode anticheat does nothing,
3) you reguarly support trolls but auto ban anyone who says anything even remotely negative (while completely ignoring context because you're too stupid to implement a proper system). 
4) All your game changes are atrocious, and are changes for the sake of change, not any real reason
5) Your skins are almost always lazy and half azz'd(kinda like that fat cow you have leading the skin team). 
6) Your commentators are some of the worst in the business(but seeing as you underpay them that's not suprising)
7) Even pro players agree you've consistently ruined your own game. The rant by faker recently was amusing
8) Your lead dev is a know troll from WOW, that no one respects nor likes, but you hired him anyway because you were too dumb to understand what that would result in
9) You're incapable of making any other game, so once league is completely dead, your company will disappear too.
10) Your prize pools for tournaments are unbelievably awful, your greed is astounding.
